measure_type.en: If your import contains waste material

sub_text.en:
The controls that apply to your waste shipment will depend on the:
  • treatment planned for the waste when it reaches its destination
  • country of destination and the transport route
  • waste type
Find out more about importing and exporting waste materials.

caption.en: If your import contains waste material

question.en: Which of the following applies to your goods?
question.cy: Pa un o'r canlynol sy'n berthnasol i'ch nwyddau?
